set.name: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Type
property.value: Exile Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Those creatures don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Cross:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Cross" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Cross" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Type
property.value: Exile Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard, then put one of them into your hand. If it's an exile creature, this creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Cross:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Cross" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Cross" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Exile Creature (When one of your Exile Creatures attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ This turn, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets +6000 power and breaks an additional shield. This turn, if that creature attacks, after the attack, you may destroy that creature.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Type
property.value: Exile Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand. {DORON GO} Alchemy:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Alchemy" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Alchemy" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Type
property.value: Exile Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. {DORON GO} Kung Fu:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Kung Fu" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Kung Fu" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ While this creature is face up in your shield zone, if your opponent's creatures attack, they must attack this shield if able.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Race
property.value: Outrage MAX

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ While this creature is face up in your shield zone, whenever any of your creatures attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than it. {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ While this creature is face up in your shield zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +5000" and breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks for the first time each turn, you may destroy one of your other creatures. If you do, untap this creature. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more and return it to its owner's hand. Then, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
